001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
004import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
005
006import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
007
008public interface PeronaMalikF {
009        
010        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
011                /** Number of iterations to perform */
012                public int iterations = 10;
013                /** Update rate (alpha) */
014                public float alpha = 0.20f;                     
015                /** Smoothness parameter (kappa) */
016                public float kappa = 25;
017                /** Specify the type of conductance function g(d) */
018                public ConductanceFunction.Type conductanceFunType = ConductanceFunction.Type.g1;
019                /** Specify the color mode */
020                public ColorMode colorMode = ColorMode.SeparateChannels;
021                /** Out-of-bounds strategy */
022                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
023        }
024        
025        public enum ColorMode  {
026                SeparateChannels, 
027                BrightnessGradient,
028                ColorGradient;
029        }
030        
031        public interface ConductanceFunction {
032                float eval(float d);
033                
034                public enum Type {
035                        g1, g2, g3, g4;
036                }
037                
038                static ConductanceFunction get(Type type, float kappa) {
039                        switch (type) {
040                        case g1:
041                                return (d) -> (float) Math.exp(-sqr(d/kappa));
042                        case g2:
043                                return (d) -> 1.0f / (1.0f + sqr(d/kappa));
044                        case g3:
045                                return (d) -> (float) (1.0 / Math.sqrt(1.0f + sqr(d/kappa)));
046                        case g4:
047                                return (d) -> 
048                                (d <= 2 * kappa) ? sqr(1.0f - sqr(d / (2 * kappa))) : 0.0f;
049                        }
050                        return null;
051                }
052        }
053
054}
